entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
